snippet: While Infiniti is floating the Q50 sedan as a technology leader, the Q50 Hybrid makes a fair statement by luxury-sedan standards: It actually has a noticeable effect on mileage.
abstract: Infiniti's Q50 Hybrid luxury-sedan, while expensive at $45,205 to start for Premium model, or $4,4000 more than non-hybrid model, has a 35 percent advantage in fuel efficiency over conventional version.
lead_paragraph: While Infiniti is floating the Q50 sedan as a technology leader, the Q50 Hybrid makes a fair statement by luxury-sedan standards: It actually has a noticeable effect on mileage.

headline.main: Hybrid Infiniti’s Allure: Fuel Savings and Power
headline.print_headline: Hybrid Infiniti’s Allure: Fuel Savings and Power
